_88EventGridDataConnectionProperties.description: Class representing the Kusto event grid connection properties.

$eref.description: The data format of the message. Optionally the data format can be added to each message.
Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___dataFormat.description: The data format of the message. Optionally the data format can be added to each message.

___storageAccountResourceId.description: The resource ID of the storage account where the data resides.

___tableName.description: The table where the data should be ingested. Optionally the table information can be added to each message.

___mappingRuleName.description: The mapping rule to be used to ingest the data. Optionally the mapping information can be added to each message.

___eventHubResourceId.description: The resource ID where the event grid is configured to send events.

___name.description: SKU name. Possible values include: 'D14_v2', 'D13_v2', 'L16', 'L8', 'Standard_DS13_v2+1TB_PS', 'Standard_DS13_v2+2TB_PS', 'Standard_DS14_v2+3TB_PS', 'Standard_DS14_v2+4TB_PS', 'Dev(No SLA)_Standard_D11_v2'

_88Zones.description: An array represents the availability zones of the cluster.
